output_spec.commit_message: feat(healio-patients): visit note append only routes

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/patient-visits-route.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Implemented protected patient visit-note list/create APIs with append-only amendment support. Added clinic/patient-scoped visit note storage in patientService, append-only amendment validation (`amendmentToVisitId` must reference an existing note for the same patient), and list ordering by newest first. Route tests cover create/list success, amendment creation, missing patient, invalid amendment target, and missing auth behavior.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Changed files: healio/app/api/v1/patients/[id]/visits/route.ts, healio/services/patientService.ts, healio/tests/unit/patient-visits-route.test.ts, plus generated healio/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo.

Endpoint verification: `node --import tsx --test tests/unit/patient-visits-route.test.ts` passed; covers POST /api/v1/patients/:id/visits (base note + amendment note, both 201), GET /api/v1/patients/:id/visits list (200), missing auth (401), missing patient (404), and invalid amendment target (404).
Append-only rule enforcement: amendments are created as new records linked by `amendmentToVisitId`; no mutation endpoint is introduced, preserving append-only history semantics.
Implementation commit: a302d25 (feat(healio-patients): visit note append only routes).
